title: Waiting (feat. Otis Parker)
lyrics:
Flashing lights
Our dreams collide
And here we are
Standing on the edge
So far from where we thought we'd ever be

So why don't we know what to do now?



'Cause I've been waiting

For you to bring me back to life

And you've been waiting

For me to be someone else this time



I've been waiting

For you to bring me back to life

And you've been waiting

For me to be someone else this time



I've been waiting

You've been waiting



Falling faster than this rollercoaster

Crash into the sun



So far from where we thought we'd ever be

So why don't we know what to do now?



'Cause I've been waiting

For you to bring me back to life

And you've been waiting

For me to be someone else this time



I've been waiting

For you to bring me back to life

And you've been waiting

For me to be someone else this time



I've been waiting

You've been waiting
